org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.plugin.reader

Interface ObservableReaderNotifier

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ObservableReader, SeReader
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SmartInsertionReader, SmartRemovalReader
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractObservableLocalReader

    public interface ObservableReaderNotifier
extends ObservableReader
    The ObservableReaderNotifier interface provides the API to notify the observers of a ObservableReader

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.event.ObservableReader

        ObservableReader.NotificationMode, ObservableReader.PollingMode, ObservableReader.ReaderObserver

      • setParameter

        void setParameter(java.lang.String key,
                  java.lang.String value)
        allows to define a proprietary setting for a reader or a plugin (contactless protocols polling sequence, baud rate, … etc.).
        Parameters:
        key - the parameter key
        value - the parameter value
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the parameter or the value is not supported
        KeypleReaderIOException - if the communication with the reader or the SE has failed

      • setParameters

        void setParameters(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters)
        allows to define a set of proprietary settings for a reader or a plugin (contactless protocols polling sequence, baud rate, … etc.).
        Parameters:
        parameters - Parameters to setup
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the parameters or the values is not supported
        KeypleException - if the parameter fails to be set up
